name: Dodge the Missiles
description:
Made the game with a 360 pad, so it plays best on a gamepad.

I've had the idea for this game floating around in my head for a while and this jam was a good enough excuse to try and put it together.

There are some things I would have liked to add in terms of polish and features (such as music) but they fall out of the limited scope required for the short game jam.

If you'd like a standalone version with better graphics, you can download it here.

Credits:

  • Skybox texture by Jockum Skoglund
  • Fighter by Surt
  • Smoke texture by MrBeast
